name: Connect The Dots: Extreme
description:
Connect the dots as fast and accurately as you can! Comment your highest score! 😆😂🤣

It's 2:30 AM where I am as of uploading this and I'm tired.

This wasn't made to be good, it was just made to exist :) 

Don't use this as a way to judge my ability as a game developer or programmer, it was a hack-job because I wanted to get it done lol

This started as a submission to the Lost Relic Game Jam, but life got in the way and I was unable to participate, but I still saw it through to the bitter end.

Please ignore Peter, I don't know how he got into the game.
